item.title: About
item.description: I am a postdoctoral researcher in Statistics at University of Milano-Bicocca.My research interests mainly concern Bayesian modeling of complex data, Bayesian nonparametrics and computational statistics. Education PhD in Statistical Sciences; University of Padova (expected completion April 2022) M.S. in Statistical Sciences; University of Padova B.S. in Statistics, Economics and Finance; University of Padova

item.title: Contact
item.description: Department of Economics, Management and Statistics (DEMS) University of Milano-Bicocca Piazza dell’Ateneo Nuovo 1, 20126 Milan Email laura.dangelo@unimib.it laura.

item.title: Publications

(2021) Bayesian nonparametric analysis for the detection of spikes in noisy calcium imaging data. arXiv preprint arXiv:2102.09403 D’Angelo L. and Canale A. (2021) Contributed Discussion on: “Centered Partition Processes: Informative Priors for Clustering”, in Bayesian Analysis, 16(1)D’Angelo L., Canale A., Yu Z. and Guindani M. (2021) Detection of neural activity in calcium imaging data via Bayesian mixture models, in Book of Short Papers SIS 2021 (Editors: Perna C.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Current position Postdoctoral scholar at University of Milano-Bicocca. Education PhD student in Statistical Science (10/2018 – 11/2021, final exam expected on 04/2022), University of Padova Thesis title: Bayesian modeling of calcium imaging data Supervisor: Prof. Antonio Canale Co-supervisor: Prof. Michele Guindani. Master’s Degree in Statistics (10/2015 – 11/2017), University of Padova Thesis title: Modelli Bayesiani nonparametrici: applicazioni al settore assicurativo (Bayesian nonparametric models: applications in insurance)Supervisor: Prof. Antonio CanaleFinal mark: 110/110 cum laude.
